title: Bug 14943: Code Assist does not respect platform line ends
description: When using code assist to create a for loop with a temporary variable, the resulting code has LF as line feeds on a Windows machine instead of the expected CR/LF. This issue occurs because code assist does not respect platform line ends.
OB:
1. Open the code editor.
2. Use code assist to create a for loop with a temporary variable.
EB:
1. Open the code editor.
2. Use code assist to create a for loop with a temporary variable.
3. Verify that the resulting code has LF as line feeds on a Windows machine.
SR: Modify the code assist functionality to respect platform line ends and ensure that the resulting code uses CR/LF line feeds on a Windows machine.
